Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_open_3D_listener

The function AIL_open_3D_listener opens a handle to the listener.

H3DPOBJECT AIL_open_3D_listener(
  HPROVIDER m3d
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the M3D library to obtain the listener from.

Returns

A handle to the M3D listener.

Discussion

This function is used to obtain a handle to the listener that can then be positioned in three dimensional space.

Many games leave the listener positioned at 0,0,0 (which is the default) and then simply move all of the 3D samples (so they never need to use this function).


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_close_3D_listener
Related Basic Types: H3DPOBJECT, HPROVIDER
